successes.title: Carvey: The 3D carving machine for the maker in all of us
successes.description: Carvey is a new, remarkably easy to use, tabletop 3D carving machine for making ideas into real objects. Make your mark.

Pledges.description:
SPECIAL THANKS: 
Join the movement!  Help us take making to the next level. You'll receive a sincere thank you from the Inventables team and we'll keep you up to date on all of our progress developing Carvey and Easel.

EASEL DESIGNER & DEVELOPER: Backers will get early access to contribute designs to the Easel Projects Library, as well as early access to the developers kit to start making apps that work on the Easel platform.

CARVEY BOTTLE OPENER KIT: 
Support the Carvey project and receive a 3D carved bottle opener kit.  You can take the project to a friend's Carvey and engrave your own design on it.  You'll get access to the design files in Easel to make your customizations.

EARLY BIRD CARVEY:
A Carvey that's ready to go, complete with a tool kit and starter bit for Early Birds.  Your machine will go out in our first round of shipments.  You'll help kickstart this movement.

CARVEY:
Same as the Early Bird, except your machine will go out in our second round of shipments. You'll get Carvey that's ready to go complete with a tool kit and starter bit. You'll help kickstart this movement.
EARLY BIRD CARVEY + ULTIMATE MAKER PACK:

You'll get a Carvey that's ready to go, plus three starter project packs for making jewelry, signs, and circuit boards. You'll also get 20 different types of materials to carve. We imagined everything you would ever want with a Carvey and put it in this pack.

Same as the Early Bird + Ultimate Maker Park and we'll ship to you in the second production run. You'll get a Carvey that's ready to go, complete with a tool kit and starter bit, plus three starter project packs for making jewelry, signs, and circuit boards. You'll also get 20 different types of materials to carve. We imagined everything you would ever want with a Carvey and put it in this pack. Your machine will go out in our second round of shipments.
BACKSTAGE PASS TO THE MAKER MOVEMENT:
